doc.name: errormessages
doc.synopsis: list of (error) messages that might occur
doc.description: Here's a list of common error messages that might occur, with a brief description of what the problem might be.
doc.parameters:
Message
TypeWhyPossible solutions
Can not find templatewsemailshown when the page mentioned in the template cannot be read or parse by the API
  • check page name if it exists or not miss-spelled
  • check if WSForm has API rights to read or parse the page mentioned in the template variable
not a secure formwsformshown when the sec option is set to true and the form has been manipulated after form submit
Secure fields not completewsformshown when the sec option is set to true and files with type is secure (not to be manipulated with) are incomplete after a form submit
Did not receive a session token from the form.wsformshown when a secure token that is generated by WSForm did not come with a form submit
Form session expiredwsformshown when the time between a form render and the actual submit has taken to long
Change the config option form-timeout-limit to a higher number in seconds ( default 7200 secs = 120 mins = 2 hours )
Form host and api host are not equal.wsformshown when the form has been submitted from a different host
This is security feature. However, sometimes in Cloud environments things can get complicated. Just make sure the one wiki does not post to an instance of another wiki
No return foundwsformshown when a form has been submitted but wsform cannot find a page to return to after handling the form
no captcha detailsreCaptchashown when a form with a recaptcha has been submitted, but no recaptcha information can be found in the form
No requestswsformshown when a form has been submitted, but WSForm could not find any valid request
Usually this means the action parameter of a form is invalid.
